name: AndroidManifest ContentProvider Exported Checking
description: Found "exported" ContentProvider, allowing any other app on the device to access it (`AndroidManifest.xml`).
remediation: Please modify the attribute in each of the exported ContentProvider to `exported="false"` or protect it with a custom permission with "signature" or higher protection level and specify it in "android:permission" attribute.

references.text: Further information can be found on the Android Developer Guide [[1]] while examples of Vulnerable ContentProviders can be found in the following blog posts [[2], [3]].
